messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the minimum build required for a monster to damage a vehicle?
Build 3+
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How would a large enough monster interact with a vehicle containing an investigator?
It might seize hold of the vehicle, much like an angry child throwing a cereal box.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should you do in response to investigator attacks when a monster is not trying to escape or being crafty?
You should fight back
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many times can a monster fight back before its enemies are granted a bonus die to their attacks?
The number of times a monster can fight back before gaining a bonus die is equal to the number of its attacks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a monster's enemies if it has more than one attack per round?
Its enemies are granted a bonus die for outnumbering it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can a monster's attackers determine if it is alive or dead?
With a successful First Aid or Medicine roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines if a monster is alive or dead?
Only a successful First Aid or Medicine roll will determine for sure whether a being is alive or dead.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the likelihood of a monster knowing spells?
The higher a monster’s POW and INT, the more likely it is to know spells.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is exempt from casting roll for monsters?
No casting roll is required for the initial casting of a spell by a monster.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be assumed about a Mythos monster's knowledge of magic?

In many cases, the Mythos monsters described here worship one or more of the Outer Gods or Great Old Ones, and it should be assumed that they would know at least one spell to contact, call, or summon their masters.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is suggested for suitable spells for each monster?
Suitable spells for each monster are suggested.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main aspect of the Mythos monsters described in the section?
The monsters described here are, in the main, repugnant to humanity in their visage and aspect.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main focus of Chapter 13?
Grimoire details many suitable spells, however Keepers are encouraged to adjust spells and use the deeper magic versions.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be considered as a threat to both an investigator's mind and body?
The monsters described here are, in the main, repugnant to humanity in their visage and aspect.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main focus of the Mythos Monsters section?
This section details the abominations of the Cthulhu Mythos—creatures of this world and from beyond.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should Keepers avoid illustrating only the visual aspect of a Mythos monster?
Because it should also include the otherworldly atmosphere created by such creatures, as well as the signifiers of smell and sound.
